metadata.title: CVE-2021-22225 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient input sanitization in markdown in GitLab version 13.11 and upallows an attacker to exploit a stored cross-site scripting vulnerabilityvia a specially-crafted markdown

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
